snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo signed off his stellar 2016 in style on Sunday, scoring a hat-trick to lift Real Madrid to Club World Cup glory and underline his status as the world's best player....
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo signed off his stellar 2016 in style on Sunday, scoring a hat-trick to lift Real Madrid to Club World Cup glory and underline his status as the world's best player.

headline.main: Ronaldo Signs Off Perfect Year in Style
headline.print_headline: Ronaldo Signs Off Perfect Year in Style
